featured.text: Whether simple or lavish, proms have always been more or less traumatic events for adolescents who worry about self-image and fitting in with their peers.
They are formal events in which teens share their traumatic experiences.

definition.zh_def: 創傷的；造成心理創傷的
definition.en_def: Causing or relating to a physical or emotional injury.
definition.example: The accident was a traumatic experience for everyone involved.
